page.title: 06The Rose and Crown Hotel.
page.content: The Rose and Crown Hotel and Pub has 10 bedrooms it is 150 years old and it was a coaching inn.25 people work there and there is 1 office there are 5 chefs.It is open at 10.30 am and closes at 11 oclock at night.It is built of brick.It once was thatched but during the 2nd world war it was burnt by fire.Mr and Mrs Davies owned the Rose and Crown before Mr and Mrs Klein they have owned it for 7 years.It is 16 pounds to stay for bed and breakfast.A pint of beer costs about 80 pence.A glass of wine costs 75 pence.For 7 pounds and 50 pence you can get vegetable soup, fillet steaks,chipped pototoes, raspberry tart and coffee to stay a week it would cost 122-50 pounds.
